articles.title: Google Messages' unsubscribe button is my secret for spam-free texting
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Google Messages introduced a new 'Unsubscribe' feature that allows users to easily stop promotional or business texts with a single tap. This function, compatible with RCS business messages, sends an opt-out command to the sender's infrastructure via the user's Google Account. The feature is currently available in several countries and is enabled by default, streamlining the process of unsubscribing from unwanted messages.

articles.title: Best strollers for 2025, as recommended by parents
articles.author: Blake Bakkila
articles.summary: The article highlights several top stroller models for 2025, including the Uppababy vista V3, praised for its smooth ride and easy operation; the Mockingbird single-to-double stroller 2.0, noted for its budget-friendliness and versatility; and the Bugaboo donkey 5 mono, recognized as a luxury option with high-quality materials. Additionally, it features the Doona as a travel stroller, Graco modes nest2grow stroller for cost-effective single-to-double use, Thule urban glide 3 as jogging stroller, Nuna mixx next as Travel System and Baby Jogger city mini GT3 all-terrain stroller for city sidewalks and trails alike.

articles.title: Google's Major Android Redesign: How to Easily Disable Blur Effects Soon
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google's Android update introduces Material You design with increased blur effects, causing user complaints about readability and battery drain. Google is addressing this feedback by introducing feature flags in future Android updates to control blur levels, with options like 'Blur behind wallpaper' and 'Disable all blurs'. Additionally, the Google Clock app is receiving a Material You update with visual enhancements.

articles.title: Google Chose Durability Over Sleekness for the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, and That's OK
articles.author: Abrar Al-Heeti
articles.summary: Google has introduced the Pixel 10 Pro Fold, emphasizing internal upgrades such as a 5,015-mAh battery and an IP68 rating for dust and water resistance. This new phone contrasts with Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold 7, which prioritizes thinness and lightness, by focusing on durability and functionality.

articles.title: Roborock Says a Robot Vacuum With an Arm Will Cost Just a Few Hundred Dollars

articles.summary: Roborock is developing a mass-market version of its robot vacuum, which features an arm to pick up socks. The new version will cost hundreds of dollars, making it more accessible than current models.

articles.author: Eric Hal Schwartz

The updated Gemini Live also includes improved speech models and better multitasking capabilities by linking to apps like Google Calendar, Messages, and Maps.

articles.author: Lauryn Jiles
articles.summary: Ninja is offering the NeverStick Pro Belgian Waffle Maker, which creates one-inch-thick Belgian waffles with five different settings. The waffle maker features a vertical design for easy storage and a non-stick surface that doesn't require oil or butter, and it's currently on sale for 20% off on Amazon.

articles.title: Nio Shares Jump on Launch of Budget-Friendly ES8 SUV
articles.author: Faizan Farooque
articles.summary: Nio launched its new ES8 electric SUV, priced at 308,800 yuan ($43,000) with a battery subscription plan. Nio is also expanding its lineup with two new brands: Onvo for the mass market and Firefly for younger buyers. The company plans to enter three new markets by 2026, including Singapore with its first right-hand drive model under the Firefly brand.

articles.title: MINILUXE REPORTS ON RECORD FINANCIAL RESULTS FOR THE SECOND QUARTER AND 1H OF 2025  Aug. 22, 2025 19:15

MiniLuxe offers a suite of trusted proprietary products used in the Company's owned-and-operated studio services.

articles.author: Brandon Vigliarolo
articles.summary: Trump Mobile is preparing to launch its T1 smartphone with a gold finish, originally slated for release by September. The phone's design has been inconsistent, with potential resemblances to the Samsung Galaxy S25 Ultra and iPhone 16 Pro, and the company has shifted its messaging about the phone's origin and manufacturing.

Smashbox Always Sharp Longwearing Waterproof Kohl Eyeliner Pencil in French Navy is used to define the eyes. Milk Makeup Lip + Cheek Cream Blush Stick in Werk is used to add warmth to the cheeks, while Charlotte Tilbury Pillow Talk Lipstick is layered with Stila Heaven's Dew Lip Oil in Clear to complete the look.

The launch included the unveiling of models like the Haier HW140-BD14387GNU1 with features such as Direct Drive motor and AI wash, the HW120-BPD14367S8U1, and the HS120-BR1BU equipped with Double Drive technology, showcasing Haier's versatility in fabric care.

articles.title: Adobe Firefly can erase photo-bombers, make you fluent in French, and more
articles.author: Kendall Cornish
articles.summary: Adobe launched Firefly in October 2024, a generative AI tool that allows users to generate images, videos, and text effects from prompts. Firefly is trained on Adobe Stock, openly licensed content, and public domain work, ensuring commercial safety and allowing users to apply Content Credentials to flag AI usage. It offers features like image and video generation, translation, and collaborative moodboarding, accessible through a mobile app synced with Creative Cloud.

articles.title: LTTS Launches PLxAI To Transform Product Development with GenAI
articles.author: BERNAMA

PLxAI combines GenAI and conventional AI to deliver solutions across all PDLC stages. The framework integrates smart prompting and contextual intelligence and has already been deployed in more than 36 use cases.

They have also released beauty dupes such as Lacura Healthy Glow Exfoliating Tonic, a dupe for Pixi Glow Tonic, Lacura Q10 Renew Anti-Wrinkle Day Cream, a dupe for Nivea Q10 Plus Anti-Wrinkle Day Cream, and Lacura Caviar Illumination Day Cream, a dupe for La Prairie Skin Caviar Luxe Cream, among others. Aldi also launched dupes of Clinique concealer and moisturiser, and has dupes of Estee Lauder and Charlotte Tilbury products.

The shampoo is part of the Olaplex bond-building system, designed to repair hair by targeting disulfide bonds damaged by chemical treatments, heat, and environmental stress. It aims to restore hair health, leaving it smoother, softer, and stronger.

articles.title: 10 best high capacity washing machine for effective laundry care at home from trusted brands LG, IFB, Bosch and others

The devices feature an AMD Ryzen Z2 processor, 1080p screen, and seamless integration with Xbox Game Pass, including a 'Handheld' compatibility program. Microsoft plans to announce the release date for the ROG Xbox Alai on October 16th.

Highlights include: NCLA Beauty's seaside-scented scrub and Orgie Acqua Croccante mousse for playful skin effects; Rooar, Coco de Mer, and Ann Summers MyViv massage oils with unique scents and benefits; Flintts Mints for dry mouth relief; For Play aphrodisiac chocolates; Tenga Arte reusable penile sleeve; Womanizer Enhance clitoral vibrator and Zalo Calla vibrating massager for pleasure; Beducated online sex skill courses; Buttress and Snatch shirt cut bra and knicker service; Step One sport boxer briefs; Tabitha Rayne scarf; Bluebella embroidery personalization service; Splash Blanket and Dame Thro waterproof sex blanket; Deep couples' card game and Monogamy board game; DS & Durga tuberose myrrhder candle, Sitre night touch massage candle and Master Series spoon and drip candle Set. These new offerings cater to diverse needs and preferences, from massage and sensual stimulation to education and playful exploration.

In the game, Hornet battles foes and solves mysteries as she ascends on a deadly pilgrimage to the kingdom's peak.

Double Up Social offers social media management, content creation, influencer campaigns, paid advertising, PR, web design, and SEO services. Pepper offers a full-service social solution across influencer marketing, organic and paid social, creative production and proprietary research (InfluenceIQ), while Tomorrow People offers brand development, messaging and positioning, content-led campaigns, creative design, website development, and full sales enablement.

The Magic V5 features a slim design, durable build with IP58/IP59 ratings, and a large 5820mAh silicon-carbon battery, and AI capabilities with Google Gemini integration. In Kuwait, the phone is priced at KWD 529 and comes with free gifts.

articles.title: How to see Vox articles first on Google

articles.summary: KENS 5 offers a streaming service accessible on phones. Users can access the service through the KENS 5 app.

articles.author: Digital Journalist
articles.summary: Fabulosa is highlighting new uses for its tumble dryer sheets, showcasing their versatility in cleaning and freshening homes beyond laundry. The sheets, costing £1.79, can remove dust, freshen drawers, pillowcases, and shoes, providing an affordable solution for household care. Fabulosa also recommends letting mattresses breathe and using Fabric Freshener to keep beds fresher for longer.

articles.title: 7 ChatGPT Prompts To Productize Your Service Business In Under An Hour
articles.author: Jodie Cook
articles.summary: The article discusses strategies for service-based businesses to productize their offerings using ChatGPT. It advises focusing on clear outcomes in headlines, breaking down delivery into simple phases, defining inclusions and exclusions, and standardizing processes. The goal is to create repeatable, scalable services, supported by social proof and clear calls-to-action.

articles.title: Circles and OpenAI Collaborate to Build SEA's First Fully AI-Native Telco Platform
articles.author: Circles
articles.summary: Circles, in collaboration with OpenAI, is launching a fully AI-native telco platform designed to redefine the telco industry. The AI-native platform will launch in Singapore first, powering Circles.Life's app, and will rapidly expand to Circles' telco partners globally. This aims to enhance customer experiences and drive efficiencies for telcos globally.

articles.title: The anti-hair loss serum that makes 'hair grow like crazy' is on sale

Champo's Pitta growth serum-large is reduced to £46 from £56.67 and Boots offers Charles Worthington Grow Strong Scalp Tonic 100ml which is currently down to £6.55.

articles.title: PicWish Launches AI Designer to Revolutionize E-commerce Product Photography
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: PicWish launched AI Designer, a new AI feature intended as a product visual solution for online sellers. The solution aims to increase image production efficiency at a low cost.

articles.title: PicWish Launches AI Designer to Revolutionize E-commerce Product Photography
articles.author: Newsfile Corp.
articles.summary: PicWish has launched its AI Designer, a new AI-powered feature designed to provide product visual solutions for online sellers. This feature offers virtual try-on, product photo generation, and color change capabilities, enabling merchants to generate product shots efficiently and cost-effectively. PicWish integrates AI models like Gemini 2.0 and GPT Image-1 for commercial-grade image generation.

articles.title: Pippit Launches "Agent Mode," a Smart Engine to Turn any Idea into a Ready-to-Share Video
articles.summary: Pippit launched Agent Mode, a new AI-powered feature designed to act as a personal AI production team within its platform. Agent Mode helps marketers, businesses, and creators produce high-quality marketing videos from a single prompt, removing barriers between concept and finished video. Users can upload reference media and create videos with AI avatars in multiple languages.

articles.title: Enjoy the evolution of image generation with Adobe Firefly AI
articles.author: The Independent
articles.summary: Adobe launched the Firefly mobile app, a generative AI tool for creating and editing images and videos, available on iOS and Android. The app offers features like text-to-image/video generation, generative fill, style and structure reference, and content credentialing, with options for both standalone use and integration with Creative Cloud Pro.

This resulted in a 10% increase in user registration rates, translating to 1.4 million additional new users and driving significant subscription revenue.

Fitroot Ghana from UG placed second with healthy snacks, Jespark Foods from UCC came third with their kenkey smoothie, and KNUST's Mushplus placed fourth with mushroom-fortified noodles and protein mixes.

articles.title: Dreame robot and cordless vacuum cleaners are available at huge price cuts on Amazon

These models feature advanced technologies like LiDAR navigation, AI obstacle detection, and powerful suction capabilities.

These agents aim to provide expert feedback, grade predictions, and reader reaction analysis at every stage of writing. Examples of these agents include an 'AI Grader' and a 'citation finder,' enhancing Grammarly's existing feature set with new AI capabilities.

This platform supports AI frameworks, generative AI models, and includes NVIDIA Isaac for robotics simulation, Isaac GR00T humanoid robot foundation models, NVIDIA Metropolis for vision AI, and NVIDIA Holoscan for real-time sensor processing.

articles.title: Nvidia confirms GeForce Now is coming to India in November: Features, price, other details
articles.summary: Nvidia's GeForce Now cloud gaming service will launch in India this November in partnership with Brothers Picture. This launch coincides with the introduction of the Blackwell RTX architecture, bringing GeForce RTX 5080-class performance to the cloud. New features like Install-to-Play and streaming at up to 5K resolution and 120fps with DLSS 4 are also included, while membership prices remain unchanged.

articles.title: Revive Your Sweaty Locks With These Dry Shampoos

articles.summary: This article highlights the introduction and features of various dry shampoo products. Brands like Crown Affair, Living Proof, Briogeo, Kristin Ess, and others offer diverse formulations, including powder and aerosol options, designed to absorb oil, refresh hair, and add volume. Many products are enriched with ingredients like biotin and rice starch, catering to different hair types and needs, from color-treated hair to oily scalps.

articles.title: The newly opened "LG Electronics flagship D5" in central Seoul is not just a home appliance store, b..
articles.author: Park Sora
articles.summary: LG Electronics has launched its flagship 'D5' location in central Seoul, which functions as a brand exhibition space rather than a typical store. The location showcases LG's OLED technology through digital art displays and allows visitors to experience products like air conditioners and washing machines in context, emphasizing the brand's history and future vision. It aims to attract premium consumers and younger generations by offering a unique brand experience.

articles.title: Microsoft Integrates PC Gaming Apps and Stores into Windows Xbox App
articles.author: Internewscast
articles.summary: Microsoft is testing a new 'My apps' feature in the Xbox app for Windows 11, which enables PC gamers to install and launch third-party apps such as browsers and gaming utilities. This feature consolidates gaming apps in a single location, enhancing the gaming library and simplifying the process of finding and launching games from various sources.

articles.title: Nikon Z 24-70mm f/2.8 S II World's First with Internal Zoom Lens; Preorder NIKKOR Z 24-70mm
articles.author: Hastings Tribune
articles.summary: B&H announced Nikon's release of the NIKKOR Z 24-70mm f/2.8 S II, a second-generation mid-range Trinity zoom lens.

articles.title: "Is this the home appliance store?"This was the first thought that came to my mind when I opened the..
articles.author: unwritten
org: National Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art
articles.summary: LG Electronics opened its flagship store 'D5' in Gangnam, Seoul, featuring product experience zones for OLED TVs, Cinema Beam projectors, and the Signature Kitchen Suite. The store allows visitors to experience the technology and brand philosophy of LG Electronics, and visually experience the power of technology through transparent OLEDs. The store also showcases premium products like the Object Collection and offers customized purchase counseling.

articles.title: AI-powered consumption: China bets on 'AI Plus' to spur market growth
articles.author: China Daily
articles.summary: JD introduced a digital human mimicking its founder in livestreaming to promote merchandise. Alibaba's Tmall uses AI-powered chatbots for customer service, while PDD Holdings leverages AI to optimize sales. Haier is deploying AI in manufacturing and integrating it into home service robots, and Hisense integrates the Xinghai large language model to enhance its smart TVs.

articles.title: Google Pixel 10 pre-orders go live with up to £700 off from Sky, O2, Amazon and EE
articles.author: Jake Hackney
articles.summary: Google has launched its Pixel 10 series, including the Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, and Pixel 10 Pro XL, featuring the Tensor G5 chip, Gemini Nano AI, and upgraded cameras. Retailers like Sky Mobile, Mobiles.co.uk, O2, Vodafone, EE and Amazon are offering pre-order deals with freebies, discounts, and trade-in bonuses.

articles.title: Zoom's Mohannad AlKalash on the interplay of AI, human-centered support
articles.author: Neesha Salian
articles.summary: AI is transforming contact centers into proactive engines that enhance customer experiences. New AI-driven features like smart routing, conversational intelligence, and proactive outreach enable companies to provide personalized and efficient customer support across multiple channels. These technologies empower agents by providing them with real-time insights and suggestions, improving first-call resolution rates and overall customer satisfaction.

articles.title: Hang Seng Index rises by midday on Friday, tech, semiconductor stocks increase
articles.author: MARKET
articles.summary: Pop Mart will launch mini Labubu this week. The company expects its revenue to hit over 30 billion yuan this year.

articles.title: Haier launches its new washing machine line in an evening of art and innovation
articles.author: The Philadelphia Inquirer
articles.summary: Haier Philippines hosted 'L'ART DU LAVAGE — The Art of Washing' to showcase the artistry and innovation behind its newest washing machine. The event combined culture, fashion, music, and technology, allowing guests to experience the product firsthand.

articles.title: Real-Time Voice Translation: Wearable Tech Potential
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Google is exploring the development of a wearable universal translator, potentially named 'Pixel Buds Pro Enhanced', featuring a next-generation Tensor chip optimized for real-time AI translation. This device aims to provide seamless, always-on translation capabilities, initially focusing on interoperability within the Google ecosystem with devices like Pixel phones and watches. The technology, building on the Real-Time Call Translation feature on the Pixel 10 Pro, targets applications in travel, business, and fostering global connections.

articles.title: Bath & Body Works opening on Friday
articles.author: Reilly Mahon
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works is opening a new 4,200 square foot store in the Lakeport Commons in Sioux City. The store, located in the former Versona Accessories space, is scheduled to open at 10 a.m. tomorrow, with construction having begun in June.

articles.title: Bath & Body Works opening on Friday
articles.author: Reilly Mahon
articles.summary: Bath & Body Works is opening a new 4,200 square foot store in Sioux City's Lakeport Commons, set to open at 10 a.m. tomorrow. This new location is in the former Versona Accessories space.

articles.title: WhatsApp's new carts feature is aimed at simplifying in-app shopping
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: WhatsApp introduced a new 'carts' feature. This feature aims to simplify in-app shopping for users.

articles.title: Google Pixel Fold 10 Pro vs Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7: Price, Specs And Design Compared
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Google is upgrading the hardware and AI features of its Pixel 10 Pro Fold. The device will compete with Samsung's Z Fold 7.

articles.title: The Most Important ‘Election' This Year Is Happening… At MYDIN?!
articles.author: Chandini Del
articles.summary: MYDIN is launching "Pilihan Raya," a marketing campaign where customers vote for their favorite brands by purchasing their products between August 24th and August 30th. Customers can also vote digitally through the MYDIN Rewards app or microsite between September 1st and September 16th. MYDIN is offering vouchers, cashback, and discounts to voters, with the winning brands to be announced on September 18th.

articles.title: Nikon Z 24-70mm f/2.8 S II World's First with Internal Zoom Lens; Preorder NIKKOR Z 24-70mm ...
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: B&H announced the release of Nikon's NIKKOR Z 24-70mm f/2.8 S II lens. Nikon positions the lens as its most essential and pro-caliber zoom lens and the first in its class to feature an internal zoom mechanism. The new lens is lighter, faster, quieter, better balanced, and more sophisticated than its predecessor.

articles.title: I saved £1,000 on household bills in just five minutes – it was so easy and now I can go on dream holiday
articles.author: Maleeha Katib
articles.summary: Nous, an AI-powered bill-cutting service, assists users in finding cheaper deals by identifying overspending areas. For example, Nous helped Rob Lock save money by recommending a Virgin Media broadband package for £22 a month, which saved him £336 a year, compared to the BT broadband package.

articles.title: Can you play Hollow Knight Silksong on Xbox Game Pass?
articles.author: Raunak Bose
articles.summary: Team Cherry will release Hollow Knight Silksong worldwide on September 4, 2025. The game will be available on Xbox Game Pass from day one for Xbox One, Xbox Series X, and Series S owners. Silksong expands on the original Hollow Knight with a larger world, new combat techniques, and optimized 4K graphics.

articles.title: GitHub - aldilaff/mcp-wyze-server: An MCP (Model Context Protocol) server for controlling Wyze smart home devices using the wyze-sdk library.
articles.summary: MCP Wyze Server provides an interface for controlling Wyze smart home devices. The server supports authentication, device discovery, device control, and group management and real-time device monitoring.

articles.title: If Your Not-So-Little One Is Starting Their Freshman Year Of College, Here Are 31 Dorm Products That Reviewers Call 'Essential'
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: Several products are mentioned with product descriptions that would be valuable to a new college student. These products include mattresses, sheets, pillows, and blankets. There are also organization products, like a shoe organizer, a mini fridge, and storage bins. Other helpful products for college students mentioned are a Brita water filter, and a Keurig.

articles.title: OpenAI's chief people officer to depart, company says
articles.author: The Standard 英文虎報
articles.summary: Pop Mart will launch mini Labubu this week. The company anticipates its revenue will exceed 30 billion yuan this year.

articles.title: Hollow Knight Silksong Release Date Confirmed: What Awaits Fans in the Long-Anticipated Sequel
articles.author: Raunak Bose
articles.summary: Team Cherry will launch Hollow Knight Silksong worldwide on September 4, 2025. The game introduces Hornet as the protagonist with evolved mechanics and a new Silk resource system. Silksong features multiple towns, a crafting and tools system, robust quests, and a new kingdom named Pharloom.

articles.title: Trump weighs using US$2 billion in CHIPS Act funding for critical minerals, sources say
articles.author: MARKET
articles.summary: Pop Mart will launch a mini Labubu this week. The company anticipates its revenue to exceed 30 billion yuan this year.

articles.title: 35 Personal Care Items You'll Wish You Found Sooner
articles.author: Courtney Lynch
articles.summary: Various companies are introducing new health and beauty products aimed at solving specific needs and enhancing self-care routines. These products range from fungal nail renewal treatments and dry shampoo to kojic acid dark spot remover soap, flossing toothbrushes, and a pore-clearing cleansing oil. Several solutions also address skin concerns, such as a hyperpigmentation stick and Cosrx Snail Mucin essence, as well as specialized tools like silicone kegel weights and podiatrist-level toenail clippers to improve personal care.

articles.title: "Do I have to change to Galaxy to use SmartSings?"I doubted my ears when I heard this from my wife, ..
articles.author: Lee Deok-Ju
articles.summary: Samsung's SmartThings platform enables users to remotely control and manage their Samsung home appliances through a smartphone app. New features include MapView for a 3D digital home representation and integration with the AI assistant Bixby. Additionally, Samsung offers 'SmartThings Pro', a B2B service extending the platform's capabilities to smart farms and offices.

articles.title: Top washing machines to grab in monsoon deals: Save big on top brands with huge price drops
articles.author: Aishwarya Faraswal
articles.summary: The article highlights monsoon season deals on various washing machines. Samsung features Eco Bubble technology and Digital Inverter motors, while LG offers Direct Drive technology with Steam Wash. Godrej uses Zero Pressure Technology, and IFB incorporates AI-powered fabric detection. Panasonic includes an in-built heater for hygienic washes and high spin speeds for faster drying.

articles.title: Tecno Spark Go 2S goes on sale in South Africa
articles.author: AKANI CHAUKE
articles.summary: Tecno has launched the Spark Go 2S smartphone in South Africa for R1 399 (US$78,79). The new device features 128GB storage, a 5,000mAh battery, a 6.67-inch screen with a 120Hz refresh rate, a 13MP dual rear camera, and an 8MP selfie camera. It also has an IP64 rating for dust and water resistance.

articles.title: 25 Products To Protect Your Peace Living With Roomies
articles.author: Celia Funderburk
articles.summary: Brita introduces a faucet filter that removes impurities like lead and microplastics directly from the tap. Skylight offers a calendar to synchronize schedules, while TubShroom presents a drain protector to prevent hair clogs in showers. Additionally, Luigi's Sink and Drain Plunger offers an effective tool for clearing clogged drains.

articles.title: New Infiniti Q50 To Get Nissan Z's 400-Hp Engine And 6-Speed Manual
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: A new Q50 model, featuring a Z-based V6 engine and a 6-speed manual gearbox, is anticipated to launch in 2027, potentially challenging European sedans.

articles.title: Trump Mobile: Fake Phone Pics & Brand Deception?
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Trump Mobile launched a new mobile network with unlimited data plans and a signature device called the T1 Phone.  The T1 phone was advertised with claims of being '100% Made in USA,' but those claims were later removed, and promotional materials used fabricated images of existing smartphones.

articles.title: 36 Solid Substitutes For Pricier Brand-Name Items
articles.author: Curtis Teegardin
articles.summary: E.l.f. introduces Halo Glow Liquid Filter as a more affordable alternative to Charlotte Tilbury's Flawless Filter. The E.l.f. product is designed to make the skin glow, blur pores, and add moisture, leaving a soft, dewy finish suitable for wearing alone, under makeup, or as a highlighter.

articles.title: Yeelight is Lighting Up IFA 2025 with New Launches and Exciting Partnerships
articles.author: Yeelight
articles.summary: Yeelight will launch new products at IFA 2025. The company also announced exciting partnerships at the event.

articles.title: Jimmy Fallon's awkward emcee act overshadows Google's AI-powered Pixel 10 reveal
articles.summary: Google launched the Pixel 10 series, including Pixel 10, Pixel 10 Pro, Pixel 10 Pro XL, and the foldable Pixel 10 Pro Fold with new features such as improved cameras, Qi2 wireless charging, and the new Tensor G5 chipset. The company also introduced the Pixel Watch 4 series and highlighted the integration of the Gemini Nano on-device assistant across all devices for enhanced AI capabilities.

articles.title: 27 Reliable Products Every Savvy Thirtysomething Will Want To Own
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: The Pink Stuff launched "Sqeezy" set, that takes their legendary cleaning paste to new heights with the help of a versatile cleaning sponge. Gold Bond launched a neck and chest firming cream specifically designed to pamper your décolletage.

articles.title: RAV4: From Compact Urban SUV to premium mid-size crossover
articles.author: Theodore Opara
articles.summary: Toyota is launching the all-new 2025 RAV4, a compact SUV featuring a 2.5-liter petrol-hybrid engine producing 219 horsepower and achieving a fuel economy of up to 22 km/l. The new model includes advanced technologies like a 10.5-inch touchscreen, Toyota Smart Connect, and enhanced safety features, and will be available in various trim levels and colors.

articles.title: Wunderkind Unveils AI Experiences: Real-Time, Agentic Messaging for Smarter Customer Engagement
articles.author: Wunderkind
articles.summary: reach has launched AI Experiences, a new AI-powered platform that offers personalized messaging strategies. This platform uses real-time behavioral data and agentic decisioning to optimize message timing, channel selection, and product recommendations across email and SMS. It aims to improve marketing performance by delivering personalized experiences and increasing conversion rates.

articles.title: Airtel boosts customer experience with WhatsApp chatbot
articles.author: Amos
articles.summary: Airtel Nigeria has launched Airtel Assist, a WhatsApp-based self-service chatbot, to enhance customer service. The chatbot enables users to perform various tasks like checking balances, purchasing airtime/data, making payments, and troubleshooting issues directly within WhatsApp, providing a convenient and personalized support experience.

articles.title: Rokid Sets Stage for AI Glasses Launch in New York  Aug. 22, 2025 00:15
articles.summary: Rokid is launching Rokid Glasses, the world's lightest full-function AI & AR smart glasses, at an event titled "Future in Sight" on August 26, 2025, in New York City. The Rokid Glasses combine advanced AI productivity tools, AR navigation, real-time multilingual translation, live transcription, and a 12MP first-person camera powered by the Qualcomm AR1 platform.

articles.title: In huge win for Trump, court throws out half-billion-dollar fraud penalty
articles.author: The Standard 英文虎報
articles.summary: Pop Mart will launch mini Labubu this week. The company expects revenue to exceed 30 billion yuan this year.

articles.title: AI role key in stimulating consumption
articles.author: FAN FEIFEI
articles.summary: JD launched a digital human mimicking its founder Liu Qiangdong, using it in livestreaming to promote merchandise and generating significant sales. Alibaba's Tmall offers AI-powered customer service chatbots, while PDD Holdings utilizes AI to optimize sales strategies. Furthermore, Haier is integrating AI into smart homes and the industrial internet, and Hisense is integrating its Xinghai large language model into its smart TVs to enhance user understanding.

articles.title: cbBTC's Astounding Rise: Unpacking Coinbase's Bitcoin Product and Its DeFi Impact
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: Coinbase launched cbBTC, a synthetic Bitcoin product, in September 2024. The product has experienced remarkable growth since its launch, contrasting with the decline of wBTC.

articles.title: I tested the first next-gen RGB mini-LED, and while it's a stunning TV, OLED doesn't ...
articles.author: Tech Radar
articles.summary: Hisense's 116UX, the first RGB mini-LED TV, was showcased, allowing for hands-on evaluation of its new technology. This product represents a new offering from Hisense.

articles.title: Engineers Turn to E-Switch.com for Innovative Solutions
articles.author: Guymon Daily Herald
articles.summary: E-Switch.com launched a completely redesigned website, intending to empower engineers and foster innovation across various industries by enabling creation of superior products.

articles.title: Cracker Barrel Shares Plummet After Pushback On New Logo, Brand Refresh
articles.author: CNBC.com
articles.summary: Cracker Barrel introduced a new logo as part of a larger brand refresh, removing the image of a man leaning against a barrel and the phrase 'old country store'. The company stated that the logo's colors were inspired by scrambled eggs and biscuits. This refresh includes updates to visual elements, restaurant spaces and food and retail offerings as part of a 'strategic transformation'.

articles.title: Microsoft's ‘My Apps' tab brings other storefronts to handheld PCs
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: Microsoft is testing a new 'My Apps' tab within the Xbox PC app. This feature allows gamers to download games from other storefronts, expanding the app's functionality.

articles.title: Nikon launches zoom lens with company's fastest-ever auto focus feature in India: Price, specs and more
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Nikon has launched the Nikkor Z 24-70mm f/2.8 S II lens in India. The lens is designed for full-frame mirrorless cameras and features an internal zoom mechanism.

articles.title: Xbox PC App Will Soon Get a Major Quality-of-Life Update
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: Xbox is currently testing a feature on its PC app. This feature enables users to access third-party launchers. The feature represents an update to the Xbox PC app.

articles.title: Festool's Latest Accessories Support Precision On-the-Go
articles.author: Morgan Citizen
articles.summary: A company has updated its existing products with new features. They have also released a final batch of limited-edition anniversary tools.

articles.title: 7 ChatGPT Prompts To Productize Your Service Business In Under An Hour
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Seven ChatGPT prompts are designed to assist users in packaging, positioning, and selling their expertise as a scalable product. This process aims to transform custom services into offerings that can be replicated and sold repeatedly.

articles.title: The next handheld battle is who can make the best Nintendo DS clone: Ayn, Ayaneo ...
articles.author: The Escapist
articles.summary: Ayn, the sister company of Retroid, revealed a Nintendo DS-like handheld via a trailer. Simultaneously, Ayaneo initiated an IndieGoGo crowdfunding campaign for their Pocket DS.

articles.title: Virgin Media shoppers rush for free �200 Sonos soundbar in epic new deal
articles.author: The Mirror
articles.summary: Virgin Media is offering a new TV and broadband bundle to new customers.

articles.title: Google's Gemini Will Soon Assist You On Smart Speakers: Will It Be Free?
articles.author: News18
articles.summary: Google will update Gemini AI on new and existing Google smart speakers. The company may also introduce a paid version of the service.

articles.title: Boots No7 luxury �104 makeup gift set reduced to just �22 online
articles.author: Manchester Evening News
articles.summary: No7 offers a product containing eight items, with five being full-sized.

articles.title: New Chip Designed To ‘Shock You' Available In Washington State
articles.author: Robb Francis
articles.summary: Rewind, a company based in the Netherlands, has launched a new corn chip flavor: 9-Volt Battery Tasting. The chips, created by Chef Mattias Larsson using citric acid, sodium bicarbonate, and mineral salts, aim to replicate the metallic taste and slight jolt of a 9-Volt battery. Currently, Rewind is offering free samples via their Instagram page and the chips are available for purchase only in the Netherlands with plans to expand into other European markets.

articles.title: Comcast Opens First Xfinity Store in Lawrenceville
articles.summary: Comcast has opened a new Xfinity Store in Lawrenceville, Georgia, offering the full suite of Xfinity services, including Xfinity Mobile. This new location provides convenient access to technology, personalized support, and a modern, interactive space to explore Xfinity Internet, Mobile, TV, and Home services.
